
{{alias}}( x )
    Converts an angle from radians to degrees.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Angle in radians.

    Returns
    -------
    y: double
        Angle in degrees.

    Examples
    --------
    > var d = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pi}}/2.0 )
    90.0
    > d = {{alias}}( -{{alias:@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pi}}/4.0 )
    -45.0
    > d = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
